message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/DBPediaApr2010 

The DBpedia Team at Freie Universit√§t Berlin is looking for a developer/researcher who wants to contribute to the further development of the DBpedia information extraction framework, investigate approaches to annotate free-text with DBpedia URIs and participate in the various Linked Data efforts currently advanced by our team.
Candidates should have
- good programming skills in Java, in addition Scala and PHP are helpful. 
- a university degree preferably in computer science or information systems.
Previous knowledge of Semantic Web Technologies (RDF, SPARQL, Linked Data) and experience with information extraction and/or named entity recognition techniques are a plus.
- Contract start date: 15 May 2010
- Duration: 1 year
- Salary: around 40.000 Euro/year (German BAT IIa)
speaker: SYSTEM
